name: Wonder Valley
description:
Hello! This is Wonder Valley, a single-player, tower defense PC game school project where you play as Alice, a boy lost in wonderland. Build and move your allies to escort Alice through waves of ever-increasing enemies to the Queen’s Castle. The team for this project includes Kee Shen and Nicholas Teoh , without whom this challenging project would likely fail.

I hope you enjoy the game!

My links:
